div.p: What is the best book you've ever read and why?
The best book i ever read was treasure Island from Robert Louis Stevenson.

There is now sixteen years ago. It was the first book who gave me pleasure to read. My french teacher forced me to chose a book for a work (the objectif was to read a book and make a text on it to give others want to read it) and i was not really interested in this but, after fews pages, it was a great discovery.

First of all, i discovered how a book offers you more possibilities than films to create your own world and characters. No matter how the author could describe things, you can always imagine them as you want.
The second point i discovered is the pirate world, The way they live and think.This stylish and highly regulated side but without concessions seduced me.
Since this moment, i read a lot and especially books on stories of pirates.
